name: MonLand Ragnarok: Game of The Year Edition
name_original: MonLand Ragnarok: Game of The Year Edition
description:
Submission for the 12th Videogame Festival for Atlantic University College Game Jam 2022

Description:
Collect all the Mons scattered across the Island.

Controls:

H - View Controls

WASD - Move
LShift - Sprint
RMB - Aim
Alt - Show Mouse
Q - Switch Mode (While Aiming)
LMB - Throw Ball/Shoot (While Aiming)
R - Reload/Recall Ball (Without Mon)
E - Summon/Recall Mon

Z - Switch Mon

Spacebar - Special Ability (Must have a Specific Mon [Palomon])

*This Action must be performed while Aiming and Having the Ball in Hand*
(You Must First Capture and Summon Palomon)

Credits:
Game Director - Angel G. Cotte Alvarado
Art Director - Siul Negron Lozada
Game Designer - Angel G. Cotte Alvarado, Siul Negron Lozada
Map Design - Anyvette M. Montañez Román
Lead Programmer - Angel G. Cotte Alvarado
Programmer - Angel G. Cotté Alvarado, Richard A. Zayas Aponte, Ian Zayas Ayala
UI Design - Anyvette M. Montañez Román
Sound Design - Richard A. Zayas Aponte, Ian Zayas Ayala
3D Modeling - Siul Negron Lozada
Concept Artist - Siul Negron Lozada
Special Thanks - Eryel Rodriguez Delgado, Angeliz Acumulada, Marina Sao, Friends and Family

Note:
*Mons Can Only be Captured if Gauge their Capture Gauge is Full (Yellow bar)*
*Press Enter, then Okay when entering

Installation:
1 - Download MonLandRagnarokGOTYEdition.rar
2 - Unzip File
3 - MonLandRagnarokGOTYEdition > MonLand.exe
4 - Enjoy.
